subject: Technology
title: The Graphics Card Arms Race
description: A quick, practical guide to The Graphics Card Arms Race.

hook.text: In PC gaming, the graphics card is king. A better GPU means prettier games and smoother performance.

buildup.text: Nvidia and AMD have battled for decades, each leapfrogging the other with every new generation.

discovery.text: Modern GPUs contain billions of transistors. They can render photorealistic scenes in real time.

twist.text: Cryptocurrency miners started buying GPUs to mine Bitcoin. Prices skyrocketed and gamers couldn't find cards.

climax.text: Top gaming GPUs now cost over $1,500. The hobby has become an expensive arms race with no finish line.

punchline.text: The quest for better pixels never ends and never gets cheaper.

quiz.question: What unexpected industry drove up GPU prices for gamers?
